languages.text: "Император защищает!" {n}Маршал складывает аквилу на груди настолько отточенным движением, что, кажется, вы слышите звук рассекаемого воздуха.{/n}
"The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Император защищает!" {n}Маршал складывает аквилу на груди настолько отточенным движением, что, кажется, вы слышите звук рассекаемого воздуха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you think you can hear it cutting the air.{/n}
"The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you think you can hear it cutting the air.{/n}
"The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

"The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}
"The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

languages.text: « L'Empereur nous protège ! » {n}Le maréchal esquisse le signe de l'Aquila en un geste si vif que vous l'entendez presque fendre l'air.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur nous protège ! » {n}Le maréchal esquisse le signe de l'Aquila en un geste si vif que vous l'entendez presque fendre l'air.{/n}

languages.text: «¡El Emperador protege!». {n}El Mariscal hace el signo del Aquila con un movimiento tan rápido que casi puedes oír cómo corta el aire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡El Emperador protege!». {n}El Mariscal hace el signo del Aquila con un movimiento tan rápido que casi puedes oír cómo corta el aire.{/n}

languages.text: “帝皇保佑！”{n}元帅猛地做了个双头鹰手势，动作非常利落，你几乎能听到他的手掌劈开空气的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “帝皇保佑！”{n}元帅猛地做了个双头鹰手势，动作非常利落，你几乎能听到他的手掌劈开空气的声音。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Imperator schützt uns!" {n}Der Marschall macht das Zeichen des Adlers mit einer derart scharfen Bewegung, dass du beinahe hören kannst, wie es die Luft durchschneidet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator schützt uns!" {n}Der Marschall macht das Zeichen des Adlers mit einer derart scharfen Bewegung, dass du beinahe hören kannst, wie es die Luft durchschneidet.

languages.text: 「皇帝のご加護の賜物だ！」{n}将帥は、空気を切る音が聞こえてきそうなほど鋭い動きでアクィラの印を作る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝のご加護の賜物だ！」{n}将帥は、空気を切る音が聞こえてきそうなほど鋭い動きでアクィラの印を作る。{/n}

languages.text: "İmparator korur!" {n}Miralay, o kadar keskin bir hareketle Çift Başlı Kartal İşareti yapıyor ki neredeyse havayı kestiğini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects!" {n}The Marshal makes the sign of the Aquila in a motion so sharp that you can practically hear it cutting the air.{/n}
